title: Quality and production enhancement of fish mint, Houttuynia cordata Thunb., cultivated in a hydroponic planting system with designed plant growth-promoting additives
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Yen Chi Loo, Yi-Hong Tsai, Hsieh Chen, Hui-Ping Hsieh, Yen-Chang Chen, Hsueh-Er Chen, Zhi-Hu Lin, Hung-Tse Huang, I-Min Liu, Chia-Ching Liaw, Fang-Rong Chang
